Change Log
^^^^^^^^^^

Porting version (EM versioning).

Version 1.0.1
"""""""""""""

* Extended the length of the group name to 48 Bytes
* Extended the length of the test name to 64 Bytes

Version 1.0.0
"""""""""""""

* New macros for managing verification requirements.

Version 0.1.0
"""""""""""""

* Initial Version.
